Emergency Alert

 


 




UCI is working to keep students safe. Supporting our community and students during this time is our top priority. Please visit UCI's coronavirus information hub (https://uci.edu/coronavirus/) for the latest campus updates.






UCI: Office of Undergraduate Admissions
UCI: Undergrad Admissions





We do different
We enthusiastically embrace the bold, independent, one-of-a kind mind. That's why UCI ranks among the top 10 public universities in the nation.
How to Apply












 








Anteater Experience
 

The most helpful resource here at UCI personally is the cultural center. That's where I found my sense of home.  


More About Arizah 



 







Different by design
Our undergraduate schools were built along a circular path called Ring Road to create a collaborative, accessible environment.
Explore Campus 






























Programs as unique as you
One of the top ten public universities in the country, UCI offers more than 80 undergraduate degree programs, innovative extracurricular activities, and the opportunity to work alongside internationally renowned faculty to produce groundbreaking work.
Explore Majors and Minors




1ST

First Public University to Create an Official Esports Program

First-year SIR and SLR

05/01

First-year Statement of Intent to Register (SIR) and Statement of Legal Residence (SLR) are due by 11:59 p.m. Pacific Daylight Time.
